concept.title: HTML 5 Video
concept.shortdesc: HTML 5 video is measured using JavaScript.

conbody.p:
To measure HTML 5 video, follow the instructions provided in
to configure video tracking using JavaScript. For example, add the Media Module to your s_code file, configure conversion variables, events, and milestones, and so on.

As described in , you must manually track the HTML 5 video events. The HTML 5 specification provides a large number of predefined event handlers you can use to manually track HTML 5 video. The following site provides details on the HTML 5 video events:
